text: Hey, not sure if anyone in the UX/Des space would be interested, but IMPACT has a webinar with Peep Laja tomorrow on Persuasive Design. As someone who’s been ramping up website experimentation, I’m pretty excited, but wanted to share for any other experimenters :nerd_face: <https://www.impactbnd.com/webinars/persuasive-web-design-how-to-get-people-to-take-action-without-using-words>
